oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Blanche Cook McClure oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McClure, Blanche Cook
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Blanche Cook McClure was in high school when the U.S. entered World War II and attended Middle Tennessee State Teachers College during the war years. Click the links in the Audio Clips field to listen to three excerpts of an oral history interview conducted in 2006.
1. World War comes to MTSTC -- 2. Campus life without men -- 3. College Training Detachment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War II

McClure, Blanche Cook; Women college students; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College; United States. Army Air Forces. College Training Detachment, 11th; World War, 1939-1945
